pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, April 29, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Montréal, Quebec

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the Sommet Construction 2019 organized by the Association des professionnels de la construction et de l’habitation du Québec.

DoubleTree by Hilton Montréal
1255, rue Jeanne-Mance

 Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive to the Grand Salon no later than 9:45 a.m.

Cambridge, Ontario

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister and President of Toyota Motor Manufacturing Canada Fred Volf will visit with employees at the Cambridge Toyota Motor Manufacturing Canada plant and make an announcement. A media availability will follow.

Toyota Motor Manufacturing Canada
1055 Fountain Street North

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity for visit
  • Open coverage for announcement and media availability
  • Media must register with michael_bouliane@toyota.ca by 10:00 a.m., and arrive no later than 12:30 p.m.
  • Media are asked to follow signs on Fountain Street to Gate 2, park in the visitor’s parking lot, and proceed to the guard house (white building, blue roof at entrance) to check in with security.
